mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, password, nickname, role, created_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, 'ROLE_USER', now())
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, email, password, nickname, profile_image, role, created_at FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT count(*) FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT count(*) FROM users WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
